title: Typing what people are doing is flaming.............................................................
body: Not raging, not saying they're bad just literally typing what they keep doing even after asking them not to or giving tips, e.g an Annie that just feeds all game only walking into death and you stay mannerful and quiet about it except for asking nicely and be a memefaced mime ragepot in the end.  Anybody know how to upload vids, I tried Vimeo  but it doesn't work.

replies.body: Just don't speak to anyone. Communicating in this game is a bad idea.
